... without trailing '/', the index 1-999 has to be added
-- Make sure that the file is UTF-8 encoded (in case check/conversion fails in GB324 job turns to MSGW)
@ Task use direct access to XML file
... check if the invoices is already handled (to avoid problems if the same file is handled twice)
